name: Christmas Piano 2015
description:
Your child will love this Christmas piano game. Keep your baby entertained while learning sounds and music! Suitable for parents and children but anyone can have fun with this free entertaining app.
Christmas Piano for Kids 2015 offers great fun that keeps your kids amused while learning to enjoy and explore music.
Entertain your kids with this free christmas piano game.

Features:
- Live Falling Snowflakes theme animation
- Real time Multi-touch system
- Colorful 8-key piano with system of learning musical scales (solmization)
- Switch to child song mode for children voices!
- 4 different instruments modes christmas bell, music box, guitar, violins sounds)
- Optimized for HD and Full HD tablets and mobiles!
- Lighting color star animation for each touch
